name: bug
description: Confirmed bugs or reports that are very likely to be bugs

name: question
description: Questions more than bug reports or feature requests (e.g. how do I do X)

name: documentation
description: Pull requests that include documentaion updates

name: feature
description: Pull requests that include new features or enhancements

name: fix
description: Pull requests that include bug fixes

name: chore
description: Pull requests that include configuration or setup

name: needs-review
description: Pull requests which need code review and approval

name: needs-testing
description: Pull requests which need manual testing

name: requires-changes
description: Pull requests which need to be updated based on review comments and then reviewed again

name: work-in-progress
description: Pull requests which are still being worked on, more changes will follow
